paragraph.paragraph: Applications and libaries created using EiffelEnvision will require the EiffelSoftware runtime to be distributed with the application and/or libraries. The Eiffel runtime, EiffelSoftware.Runtime.dll, presence is imperative to the execution of any application creating in EiffelEnvision and so must be included when deploying applications.

For ease of distribution you should include eeredist.msm in any vbconSetupProjects 0 setup and deployment project created deploy_setup.xml inside or deploy_no_setup.xml outside of Visual Studio .NET . It is not essential to include eeredist.msm in any deployment package, however exluding it will require you to add EiffelSoftware.Runtime.dll, from your projects bin\configuration_name folder, where configuration_name is the name of the configuration.
paragraph.tip: Tip: If you chose to use one of the Visual Studio .NET vbconSetupProjects 0 setup and deployment projects eeredist.msm will be included automatically for you as a dependency.
paragraph.warning: Important: Please review the url *End-User License Agreement (EULA) to know your rights regarding distributing EiffelSoftware.Runtime.dll, for the ../../introduction/editions.xml Edition of EiffelEnvision you are using.
